choices: If the first four options are taken, then click here....
1.content:
"Do you guys really have to leave me here with YOUR NAME HERE?" I asked as I rolled my eyes. "Yes, your father and I have been trying to get away from your constant bickering, we need some time to ourselves." Our mother replied. She was right. The both of us were already down each others throats, and barely get along. Every single day we fought over just about anything and everything. Literally.

"Ugh. Fine. I'll take care of the little brat!" I shouted back, pouting and crossing my arms over my chest.

"We're trusting in you guys not to hurt each other. If we have to come back early, you two will be punished, understood?" Our dad firmly stated.

"Y-Yes. Understood." I replied. "Good. We love you guys. We'll call you guys when we get there. Seee ya later." The parents said as they pulled their suitcases out with them.

I leaned against the door frame and watched them drive away before closing the door behind me and locking. I glance over to you and rolled my eyes. "Don't talk to me, okay?" I said as I walked passed you.

Little did I know, you knew of the trip and had been planning to get some pay back on me for being so mean and rude to you. Unfortunately for me, it was going to be the stinkiest, and filthiest punishment I'll ever recieve.

I walked over and sat down on the couch and began reading through my text messages, unaware that you were tip-toeing right behind me.
1.title: The beginning of the next horrible month

info.brief_description: a 1st-person roleplay interactive! Humiliate and abuse me!
info.description:
THE MAIN STORYLINE:
In this interactive roleplay, I play the role of your older brother, and you play the role of my little sister or brother. Our parents are gone for a month and left me in charge, except things turn for the worst and I end up as your stink slave! You're literally free to do whatever you want to me!


RULES AND GUIDELINES FOR THE INTERACTIVE ROLEPLAY:
- The entire roleplay needs to be written in 1st-person point of view. (IE: I groan out as you lower your bare ass onto my face).
- I'm not asking you to write a novel. I just expect each response to be at least a paragraph or two long each time. No 1-4 sentences.
- In this roleplay, I'm the one that gets humiliated and abused by you!
- Yes, you're even allowed to eat me in this to end our storyline, but don't do it too early! Wait until the 15th or so chapter!
- Spelling and grammar are definitely important. Make each of your replies and paragraphs look good. Typos are fine, as long as it isn't a lot.
- Each response should only have ONE option choice to pick, so that way it'll lead in only one direction. I will edit and remove multiple options.
- Do NOT add to anyone else's roleplay with me. There will be plenty of chances for you to join in on torturing me if you're interested in playing.
- Be detailed in your replies. Be honest, you don't enjoy reading posts that have little to no detail in them, right? They're boring to read.
- Toilet play, scat torture and piss play can be allowed, but keep it at a minimum. Mostly as a form of punishment.
- If you no longer wish to continue our roleplay, then please let me know so I can remove it to give people some more to join.
- I don't want any scenes that involve animals in it. That's too gross for me, and it's something I'm NOT into.

NOTE: I reserve the right to edit and/or delete any posts that violate any of the rules and guidelines listed above. If you comply with them, your post will remain the way you written it. Also, if you have any questions about this interactive roleplay before you decide to join in, or even while you're in the middle of a storyline with me, feel free to message me! I'll reply ASAP!
info.pretty_title: The Day I Became YOUR Slave
